summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup is a long-wearing 2-in-1 powder + foundation that also works as an over-foundation finisher.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination.Coverage: Moderate.Finish: Matte.Long-wearing, 2-in-1 powder + foundation in a portable compact.Full-coverage powder works as an over-foundation finisher or as a powder foundation.Extra-cling formula for double coverage.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2260625How To UseApply after using your 3-Step Skin Care System. Smooth powder on with included sponge applicator. Use where needed, or for allover application start in center of face, blending outward with fingertips. For a seamless look blend well, especially along jawline. Sponge applicator is washable with soap and water; allow to dry completely before next use. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.IngredientsTalc, Isostearyl Linoleate, Titanium Dioxide, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Trimyristin, Alumina, Methicone, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate. May Contain: Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Carmine (CI 75470), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply after using your 3-Step Skin Care System. Smooth powder on with included sponge applicator. Use where needed, or for allover application start in center of face, blending outward with fingertips. For a seamless look blend well, especially along jawline. Sponge applicator is washable with soap and water; allow to dry completely before next use. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for years!
reviews.comments: Would recommend this product.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love it. Coverage is very good.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for 30 years
reviews.comments: I love it! It just works for me. I have tried others but always come back to this one. If you like quick and easy, this is awesome. Clinique, please don't ever discontinue this!

reviews.headline: Wonderful product
reviews.comments: Great product for summer coverage

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I love Clinique products. I've used them for years

reviews.headline: Great product, horrible shipping.
reviews.comments:
Ordered this product online to save time. The superpowder was shipped in a bubble envelope, the lack of sufficient packaging resulted in my pressed powder being completely pulverized into loose powder. 

While I do recommend the product, I 
do not recommend ordering it from Ulta online.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: With aging skin, I have found it harder to wear foundation.  This powder makeup foundation is exactly what I needed.  I can get away with the tinted moisturizer, and use this powder on top of it.  Applies smoothly and doesn't feel heavy on my face.  Very little settling into wrinkles and creases.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Does not define pores.  Smooth look.

reviews.headline: I never was wrong  with Clinick
reviews.comments: I love it!

reviews.headline: My one and only
reviews.comments: Been using it for more than 20 years , it works perfect on my skin, never had any issues .

reviews.headline: Usually love Clinique, but...
reviews.comments: I'm a fan of Clinique and have used their powders before (compressed and loose). This was suggested to me, and it didn't work. Made me look very dull and dry. Good for other skin types.

reviews.headline: The Best!
reviews.comments: I have been using this powder for as long as I can remember, (around 35 years?), and I love it!  It looks very natural on my skin, while giving me the coverage I need.

reviews.headline: Used this for years and I love it!
reviews.comments: I've been using this powder for years and I love it. Some products are staples in life and for me this is one of them. Coverage is amazing and it doesn't look or feel cakey.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I've been using Clinique's Superpowder for years. On its own, it's very light - it will even your skin tone and provide a good base for eyeshadow, but not much else. Personally, I enjoy wearing it on top of a liquid foundation for extra coverage and evenness. My only complaint with it is that it doesn't really play nice with oily skin (which I have, unfortunately).

reviews.headline: Been using it for years! My favorite
reviews.comments: Excellent coverage

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: I tried this product in store and was so excited to use it once I got home. My excitement turned into major disappointment. At first the coverage went on great it covered the redness in my skin. Sadly after only a short amount of time less than a few hours it literally look like it was sliding off my face and was very patchy. You could literally see lines between my skin and the powder. I did my normal makeup routine that I always do before I put a powder foundation I prepped my skin I used a primer same one that I've always used. But I need makeup that will last more than a couple hours. Very very sad that I will have to return this product.

reviews.headline: This foundation is horrible.
reviews.comments: This powder makeup goes on blotchy and the color turned orange on my face. It  is horrible. I am going back to Lanc√¥me.

reviews.headline: Second time buying this product!
reviews.comments: Usually I don't rebuy makeup unless I absolutely love it. This one is so amazing! Its so nice as a foundation and my favorite is combining it with my foundating for a beautiful flawless full coverage look. So nice and easy to touch up at work as well!

reviews.headline: Love it! Finally found the Best one
reviews.comments: This is My second attempt to find the best coverage and Clinque is the Best. Thank you!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Best cover up makeup

media.headline: Been using it for years! My favorite
I would continuously buy this product!
media.caption: Goes on smooth

media.headline: This does not come in enough Shades & Main Ingredient- talc!
media.caption: Too pale!

faceoff_positive.comments: This powder is a good option for anyone who usually has to avoid powder due to dry skin. It provides very natural looking coverage and the colors are neutral and blendable. It's quick and convenient like a powder, but it somehow leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized instead of flaky like most powder. On light days I apply all about eyes concealer (yes, I use it for concealer anywhere, it's so smooth), and then I brush this powder lightly over my face. The coverage is buildable so you can just apply another layer if you want more. It will rub off on clothing or hands so let it set before pulling on a turtleneck.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best powder to use as foundation ever!

faceoff_negative.comments: I tried this when I was looking to get away from Bare Minerals and try different Compact powders that would be easier to carry around and I tried all of the compacts that Clinique carries including this one and the closest color they had was the lightest shade they make in this which was too light for me and the next shade was way too dark so I looked like a ghost after they applied it..and it broke me out the next day- and when I was wearing it, it felt very heavyand oily. Also, the main ingredient is talc which we know can cause ovarian cancer so I would stay away from it. BareMinerals blemish remedy is amazing and all of the ingredients are wonderful.
faceoff_negative.headline: This does not come in enough Shades & Main Ingredient- talc!
